name: Infection: Humanity's Last Gasp
description: Infection: Humanity's Last Gasp uses simple mechanics in a multitude of combinations to create engaging, deep gameplay as you try to eliminate an evolving virus that could spell the end of the human race.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0

reviews.review_text: I can't recommend it as is, because it keeps crashing and has weird bugs.  PROS: interesting concept for a puzzler slick presentation and GUI  CONS: crashes and bugs the game kind of slogs with fake loading, speed up the flow of the game  I'll check back in after a couple patches and alter my review if things get fixed up.
